CustomField.description: Application Property value, stored as a string but can be retrieved in code as a string, boolean or integer. Boolean properties should have a value of 'true' or 'false'.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Application Property value, stored as a string but can be retrieved in code as a string, boolean or integer. Boolean properties should have a value of 'true' or 'false'.
CustomField.label: Value
